free_text.Learning outcomes: Critical discussion of current research in computational neuroscience. The aim is to achieve a level of competence where students can understand and critically evaluate current research results.
free_text.Content: This course covers current problems in computational neuroscience. During each session, a hot research topic will be introduced by an external speaker who has significantly contributed  to the research in that area. For the exam, the student can choose 5 topics out of the list of topics in a semester.[br/]Examples are: neuron models, system level models

free_text.Contenu: [br/]This course covers current problems in computational neuroscience. During each session, a hot research topic will be introduced by an external speaker who has significantly contributed  to the research in that area. For the exam, the student can choose 5 topics out of the list of topics in a semester.[br/][br/]Examples are: neuron models, system level models
